PositiveEntailmentTest.purpose: This test shows a sample scenario related to exchanging electronic business contracts across rule platforms.
PositiveEntailmentTest.description: The business rule captured is: if an item is perishable and it is delivered to a store more than ten days after the scheduled delivery date then the item will be rejected by the store
